movies-popular.title: Inception
movies-popular.description: A skilled thief, the best in the dangerous art of extraction, steals secrets from within the subconscious during the dream state.

movies-popular.title: The Dark Knight
movies-popular.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies-popular.title: Interstellar
movies-popular.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies-popular.title: The Matrix
movies-popular.description: A hacker discovers that the reality he lives in is a simulated reality created by machines, and joins a rebellion to overthrow them.

movies-popular.title: Pulp Fiction
movies-popular.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies-popular.title: The Godfather
movies-popular.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies-popular.title: Fight Club
movies-popular.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies-popular.title: Forrest Gump
movies-popular.description: The story of Forrest Gump, a man with low intelligence, whose accidental good fortune takes him through extraordinary events.

movies-popular.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies-popular.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies-popular.title: Gladiator
movies-popular.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies-popular.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies-popular.description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

movies-popular.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies-popular.description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies-popular.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies-popular.description: In the midst of World War II, a group of U.S. soldiers must retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies-popular.title: Jurassic Park
movies-popular.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

movies-popular.title: Titanic
movies-popular.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies-popular.title: Avatar
movies-popular.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies-popular.title: The Social Network
movies-popular.description: As Harvard students create the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, they feud with each other and with the law.

movies-popular.title: Schindler's List
movies-popular.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler saves the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees.

movies-popular.title: The Lion King
movies-popular.description: Lion cub and future king Simba flees his kingdom after the death of his father, but returns as an adult to reclaim his throne.

movies-popular.title: Star Wars: A New Hope
movies-popular.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

movies-popular.title: The Godfather Part II
movies-popular.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies-popular.title: The Departed
movies-popular.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies-popular.title: Goodfellas
movies-popular.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

movies-popular.title: The Prestige
movies-popular.description: In the end, the rivalry between two magicians leads to obsession and murder.

movies-popular.title: 12 Angry Men
movies-popular.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
